# 下流社会

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xialiu-shehui
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xialiu-shehui
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xialiu-shehui
xialiu-shehui <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xialiu-shehui
xialiu-shehui <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
